title: Universal Car Cup Holder Insert
description: Adjustable car cup holder with spring-loaded grips for multiple cup sizes

parameters.cup_diameter_min: Minimum cup diameter to hold in mm
parameters.cup_diameter_max: Maximum cup diameter to hold in mm
parameters.insert_height: Total height of insert in mm
parameters.grip_thickness: Thickness of grip arms in mm
parameters.base_diameter: Outer diameter of base (fits car holder) in mm
parameters.base_height: Height of base section in mm
parameters.spring_flex: How much grips can flex inward in mm
